//versionComments1: Add version revisions to this comment when making a push.
//versionComments2: Add a comment to this line when making a push describing the changes made.
//versionComments3: 0 Represents the production version of the application.
//versionComments4: 0.0 Represents the development version of the application. Any major changes made to the application.
//versionComments5: 0.0.0 Represents any minor changes made to the application. A final push to a branch. A bug fix or patch.
//versionComments6: 0.0.0.0 Represents any insignificant changes made to the application. A change to a comment or a README file.
